desc: Anyone with a recent model smartphone can scan this NFC booomtag - lost and found sticker to contact its rightful owner. Stick it. Scan it, and... booom, your contact details are safe. Locked behind our gateway, respecting and protecting your privacy.

layout.text:
Anyone with a recent model smartphone can scan this NFC booomtag® for owner or SOS/ICE contact details.
Apply it. Scan it, and... booom, your contact details are safe. Locked behind our gateway, respecting and protecting your privacy.
